mapper.sql: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.summary, p.category_id, p.author_id, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.created_by, p.updated_by, p.deleted_at, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description, u.id as author_user_id, u.username as author_username, u.email as author_email, u.avatar_url as author_avatar_url, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments cm WHERE cm.post_id = p.id AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL) as comment_count FROM posts p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users u ON p.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN post_tags pt ON p.id = pt.post_id LEFT JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.id WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.summary, p.category_id, p.author_id, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.created_by, p.updated_by, p.deleted_at, c.id as cat_id, c.name as cat_name, c.description as cat_description, u.id as author_user_id, u.username as author_username, u.email as author_email, u.avatar_url as author_avatar_url, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments cm WHERE cm.post_id = p.id AND cm.deleted_at IS NULL) as comment_count FROM posts p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users u ON p.author_id = u.id WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status = 'published'
AND p.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM post_tags pt2 WHERE pt2.post_id = p.id AND pt2.tag_id = #{tagId})
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.summary, p.category_id, p.author_id, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at, COUNT(c.id) as comment_count FROM posts p LEFT JOIN comments c ON p.id = c.post_id AND c.deleted_at IS NULL WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status = 'published' GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.summary, p.category_id, p.author_id, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at ORDER BY comment_count DESC, p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.summary, p.category_id, p.author_id, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM posts p WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status = 'published' ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts p WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) FROM posts p INNER JOIN post_tags pt ON p.id = pt.post_id WHERE pt.tag_id = #{tagId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( title, content, summary, category_id, author_id, status, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{categoryId}, #{authorId}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, summary = #{summary}, category_id = #{categoryId}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, summary, category_id, author_id, status, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by, deleted_at FROM posts WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM posts WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
